short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visualize obscure measurements in bananas, Starbucks coffee, and more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For Scale simplifies obscure measurements by representing them in familiar and ordinary objects -- such as bananas, coffee, dogs, and more! Simply highlight and right click on a measurement, and turn it into something much more understandable!
